Tom Hatfield wrote:
> i was just wondering if there were any major battles or any more well known
> samurai born on june 23?

Well, on the 23rd day of the sixth month of 1590, Maeda Toshiie and Uesugi 
Kagekatsu wiped out Hachi�ji Castle. Of course, that wasn't actually June 23, 
though -- it was actually sometime in May.

Tony
